response.original_title: Over 50 Finds Work as Porn Actress
response.overview: Everyone assumes that porn work is limited to young girls with little to no experience, but, as this offering from the guys at Brave Films serves to underline, that isn't always the case. In fact, there are plenty of women with miles on the clock who are more than happy to show off their sex skills to the world, and while turning fifty might be seen as a barrier in some professions, it certainly isn't the case here. Indeed, let's be perfectly honest, the women in this kinky escapade very often put their younger counterparts to shame, as they seek out dick on an almost continual basis in the hope of getting as much spunk out of those tight, hairy balls as they possibly can. A mission that they complete with breathless ease, it has to be said!
